original_text: But this man, after he had offered one sacrifice for sins for ever, sat down on the right hand of God;
korean_text: 오직 그리스도는 죄를 위하여 한 영원한 제사를 드리시고 하나님 우편에 앉으사

sentences.original_text: after he had offered one sacrifice for sins for ever,
sentences.korean_translation: 영원한 죄를 위하여 한 제물을 드린 후에,

sentences.original_text: sat down on the right hand of God;
